Posts.Content: Hi everyone, just wandering if anyone is taking Raloxifen, ive been taking Tamoxifen since July 2011 but i ve been having terrible side effects, achy bones, terrible ankle pain which i was unable to walk up the stairs,I was told to stop the Tamoxifen for a few wks to see if it was them giving me all the joint pain and since stopping them i feel 100% so they have  now changed me to Raloxifen so was just wandering if anyone else is on these? and how they are feeling on these?                                                                                          Thanks                                                                                            Celyn 8 xx
Posts.Title: Raloxifen
